title: SetPriorityArray (Method)
text:
METHOD SetPriorityArray : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Command Prioritization - sets the whole Priority_Array of this BACnet object.
To write the Present_Value with a single priority
WritePresentValueWithPriority
can be used.

rows.Name: arPrioArray
rows.Comment: The priority array to set for this BACnet object.
